mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_APPROVAL (DOC_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, APP_TITLE, APP_DESCRIPT, APP_END_DATE, APP_OPEN) VALUES (#{ documentDTO.docCode }, #{ memberDTO.memberCode }, #{ appTitle }, #{ appDescript }, #{ appEndDate }, #{ appOpen } )

INSERT INTO TBL_APPROVAL_LINE (APP_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, APP_STATUS) VALUES
(#{ approvalLine.appCode }, #{ approvalLine.memberDTO.memberCode }, #{ approvalLine.appStatus })
mapper.select:
SELECT * from TBL_APPROVAL ta JOIN TBL_DOCUMENT td ON ta.DOC_CODE = td.DOC_CODE JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON ta.MEMBER_CODE = tm.MEMBER_CODE
where ta.APP_DATE >= date_sub(now(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) and ta.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode }
SELECT * from TBL_APPROVAL ta JOIN TBL_DOCUMENT td ON ta.DOC_CODE = td.DOC_CODE JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON ta.MEMBER_CODE = tm.MEMBER_CODE where ta.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode }

select ta.*, td.DOC_CODE, tm.MEMBER_CODE, tm.MEMBER_NAME, tm.MEMBER_ID, tm.MEMBER_EMAIL from TBL_APPROVAL ta JOIN TBL_APPROVAL_LINE tal ON tal.APP_CODE = ta.APP_CODE JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tm.MEMBER_CODE = tal.MEMBER_CODE JOIN TBL_DOCUMENT td ON td.DOC_CODE = ta.DOC_CODE where ta.APP_CODE = #{ appCode }

select tal.*, tm.MEMBER_CODE, tm.MEMBER_NAME, ta.APP_CODE, td.DOC_CODE from TBL_APPROVAL_LINE tal JOIN TBL_APPROVAL ta ON tal.APP_CODE = ta.APP_CODE JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tm.MEMBER_CODE = tal.MEMBER_CODE JOIN TBL_DOCUMENT td ON td.DOC_CODE = ta.DOC_CODE where tal.APP_CODE = #{ appCode }

select tal.APP_LINE_CODE, tal.APP_STATUS, tal.APP_CODE, ta.*, td.* from TBL_APPROVAL_LINE tal JOIN TBL_APPROVAL ta ON tal.APP_CODE = ta.APP_CODE JOIN TBL_DOCUMENT td ON ta.DOC_CODE = td.DOC_CODE where tal.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } and tal.APP_STATUS = 'n';
select * from TBL_APPROVAL ta join TBL_APPRsetLineApprovalOVAL_LINE tal ON (ta.APP_CODE = tal.APP_CODE) where tal.APP_STATUS = 'Y' and ta.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode }
mapper.delete: delete from TBL_APPROVAL where APP_CODE = #{ appCode }; delete from TBL_APPROVAL_LINE where APP_CODE = #{ appCode }
